title: Populate DishMatch with 50 mock Tokyo restaurants and integrate Unsplash placeholder images

requirements.summary: Integrate Unsplash placeholder images for each restaurant's 5-photo carousel using high-quality food/interior photography queries
acceptanceCriteria: Each restaurant card displays 5 photos from Unsplash
Photos use the Unsplash Source API or similar high-quality food/interior photography
Carousel tap interaction cycles through all 5 photos correctly
Images load properly and display in the card interface

file_operations.description: Update the RestaurantCard component to generate 5 distinct Unsplash placeholder image URLs per restaurant using the Unsplash Source API format (https://source.unsplash.com/800x600/?restaurant,food,interior with unique seeds or query variations). Ensure the existing carousel tap interaction cycles through all 5 photos correctly by managing the current photo index state.

Add an optional photos array field (photos?: string[]) to the Restaurant type interface to support storing the 5 Unsplash image URLs. This allows the component to reference pre-generated URLs if needed while maintaining backwards compatibility with existing data structures.

requirements.summary: Display the gold plate/spoon logo as a circular icon in the app header using the generated asset
acceptanceCriteria: Logo image is stored in frontend/public/assets/generated/
Logo displays as circular icon in app header

file_operations.description: Update the Header component to display the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/dishmatch-logo.dim_200x200.png as a circular icon. Apply CSS styling to ensure the logo appears as a circular icon with transparent background support. Use the exact workspace file path frontend/public/assets/generated/dishmatch-logo.dim_200x200.png when referencing the image asset.
